    • Method Detail

      • createGame

        public static void createGame()
        Creates all the necessary objects for the game.

        Creates the starting fields and all the Objects needed to run the game.

      • startGame

        public static void startGame()
        Runs the game.

        Runs player and AI decisions for the game and keeps the game running until on side has won.
